# Check DOP data

**Purpose:** Code to check DOP data for errors

**Author:** Perry ([sarah.perry\@water.ca.gov](mailto:sarah.perry@water.ca.gov){.email})

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
library(lubridate)
source('admin/global_functions/global_funcs.R')
source('admin/global_functions/check_funcs.R')
set.seed(42)
```

```{r}
load('synthesized/02_group_data/USBR-DOP.RData')

# format main dataframe (species unit)
df_phyto <- df_dop %>%
  mutate(
    Date = parse_date_time(Date, orders = c('ymd', 'dmy', 'mdy')),
    Year = factor(year(Date)),
    Event = paste(Date, Station, sep = '_'),
    Binary = 1
  )

# filter outlier
df_phyto <- df_phyto %>%
  filter(!(Event %in% c('2019-11-14_ICF1729','2021-04-01_ICF3129')))

# format df (genus unit)
df_genus <- df_phyto %>%
  group_by(Event, Date, Year, Station, Genus, Survey) %>%
  summarize(Biovolume_per_mL = sum(Biovolume_per_mL),
            Cells_per_mL = sum(Cells_per_mL),
            Units_per_mL = sum(Units_per_mL),
            .groups = 'drop') %>%
  mutate(Binary = 1)
```

# NMDS by Genus and Event

### Cells
```{r}
# create NMDS
df_nmds_cell <- calc_nmds(df_genus,
                      taxa_var = 'Genus',                    
                      group_var = 'Event',
                      factor_var = 'Year',
                      nmds_var = 'Cells_per_mL',
                      try = 5, trymax = 5)

# print plot
plt_nmds <- plot_nmds(df_nmds_cell$df_nmds, df_nmds_cell$meta_vars, fill_var = 'Year')
plt_nmds

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Synthesized Dataset/01 Group Checks/USBR-DOP/graphs/DOP-Synth_Genus_Cells_Year.jpg'),
  plot = plt_nmds,
  width = 8,
  height = 6
)
```

### PA
```{r}
# create NMDS
df_nmds_pa <- calc_nmds(df_genus,
                      taxa_var = 'Genus',                    
                      group_var = 'Event',
                      factor_var = 'Year',
                      nmds_var = 'Binary',
                      distance = 'jaccard',
                      try = 5, trymax = 5)

# print plot
plt_nmds <- plot_nmds(df_nmds_pa$df_nmds, df_nmds_pa$meta_vars, fill_var = 'Year')
plt_nmds

ggsave(
  filename = abs_pesp_path('Synthesized Dataset/01 Group Checks/USBR-DOP/graphs/DOP-Synth_Genus_PA_Year.jpg'),
  plot = plt_nmds,
  width = 8,
  height = 6
)
```
